sentences.sContent: Radio was the pilot’s only means of communication.

sentences.sContent: There has been a breakdown in communication (= failure to communicate ) .
Paris has good communications with many European cities.
sentences.sCn: 巴黎与许多欧洲城市之间交通便捷。

sentences.sContent: ...it is indispensable that communication between doctor and patients should be strengthened due to the the fact that doctor-patient communication can be seen as a bridge of two-way communication between doctors and patients...
...The contest was proved to be a good method of promoting cultural communication between China and other parts of the world...
...They weren't using it as a source of communication because they couldn't read or write in it...
...As electronic communication is not limited by space...
...others are under the impression that electronic communication can replace face-to-face contact...
...We tend to pay more attention to electronic communication than to face-to-face contact...
...we need to realize that the virtual net could never take place of the face-to-face communication among human beings...
...There is no consensus of opinions among people regarding whether electronic communication can replace face-to-face contact...
...it is advisable for us to have a more face to face communication with our families...
...these useful and powerful communication tools have made it much faster...
